TheWord.Title: I pray Your God will see me, now.

BibleWord.Commentary: He shall pray unto God, and He will be favourable unto him: and He shall see his face with joy: for He will render unto man his righteousness (Job 33:26). God looked down from heaven upon the children of men, to see if there were any that did understand, that did seek God (Psalms 53:2).
